directives.description: Has a high frequency of personal pronouns such as 'you' or 'I'
directives.code:
def check(x):
    text = '' if x is None else str(x)
    personal_pronouns = ['you', 'I']
    frequency = sum(text.lower().count(pronoun) for pronoun in personal_pronouns)
    return frequency > 0

directives.description: Includes informal language or slang, indicated by the presence of words like 'yo' or 'bro'.
directives.code:
def check(x):
    text = '' if x is None else str(x)
    informal_language = ['yo', 'bro']
    frequency = sum(text.lower().count(word) for word in informal_language)
    return frequency > 0
